thread.title: Arrow Mega Buzz: Sara Will Have Lost Her Humanity When She Returns
thread.title_full: Arrow Mega Buzz: Sara Will Have Lost Her Humanity When She Returns

title: Arrow Mega Buzz: Sara Will Have Lost Her Humanity When She Returns
text: Katie Cassidy Sunday, 18 October 2015 (12 minutes ago) Laurel (Katie Cassidy) may have decided to bring her sister Sara (Caity Lotz) back from the dead on Arrow, but she can't bring back her sister's humanity. As seen in Wednesday's episode, the Lazarus Pit has already begun to have serious effects on Thea (Willa Holland), who was only briefly dead before her resurrection. [...] since Sara has been dead for months, that means the Pit's influence on her will be far worse, something she will continue to deal with when she joins the spin-off Legends of Tomorrow in 2016. It's kind of this paradox that she's selected for the team because she's this ruthless, cold-blooded assassin and what she really wants is to feel again.
